title:
On the partial $ \mathscr L $-$ \Pi $-property of subgroups of finite
  groups
abstract:
Let $ H $ be a subgroup of a finite group $ G $. We say that $ H $ satisfies
the partial $ \mathscr L $-$ \Pi $-property in $ G $ if $ H\unlhd G $, or if $
| G / K : \mathrm{N} _{G / K} (HK/K)| $ is a $ \pi (HK/K) $-number for any $ G
$-chief factor of type $ H^{G}/K $ with $ H_{G}\leq K $. In this paper, we
investigate the structure of finite groups under the assumption that some
subgroups of prime power order satisfy the partial $ \mathscr L $-$ \Pi
$-property.
